array.string: Die Grenzen meiner Sprache bedeuten die Grenzen meiner Welt. - Ludwig Wittgenstein
Wer fremde Sprachen nicht kennt, weiß nichts von seiner eigenen. - Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
Notitia linguarum est prima porta sapientiae. - Roger Bacon
Bir dil bir insan, iki dil iki insan.
Language is the road map of a culture. It tells you where its people come from and where they are going. - Rita Mae Brown
La lengua es la piel del alma. - Fernando Lázaro Carreter
學而時習之 不亦說乎
Kolik jazyků znáš, tolikrát jsi člověkem. - Tomáš Garrigue Masaryk
Every language is a temple, in which the soul of those who speak it is enshrined. - Oliver Wendell Holmes
La parole a été donnée à l'homme pour déguiser sa pensée. - Charles Maurice de Talleyrand-Périgord
Am fear a chailleas a chanain caillidh e a shaoghal.
学一门语言，就是多一个观察世界的窗户。
Un vocabolario può contenere solo una piccola parte del patrimonio di una lingua. - Giacomo Leopardi
Perhaps of all the creations of man language is the most astonishing. - Giles Lytton Strachey
Le mal qui est dans le monde vient presque toujours de l'ignorance - Albert Camus
If you talk to a man in a language he understands, that goes to his head. If you talk to him in his language, that goes to his heart. - Nelson Mandela
قوّة الإنسان فى عقله و لسانه
